name: musingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows that you are thinking a lot about something: She looked musingly out of the window at the soldiers passing by. "Now that's interesting," he said musingly.
More examplesFewer examples"There's still one thing I don't understand," she said musingly.The toddler flung his teddy to the floor, then looked down at it musingly.He looked musingly at her as she approached.She sat in an armchair staring musingly at the fire.The two sisters looked musingly at each other.
